original_text: Some Jewish believers were there who also belonged to the Pharisees' group. They stood up and they said, ‘We must circumcise Gentiles when they become believers. We must tell them to obey all the Law that God gave to Moses.’
korean_text: 바리새파 중에 어떤 믿는 사람들이 일어나 말하되 이방인에게 할례를 행하고 모세의 율법을 지키라 명하는 것이 마땅하다 하니라

sentences.original_text: who also belonged to the Pharisees' group
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 바리새인 그룹에 속해 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: We must tell them to obey all the Law
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그들에게 모든 율법을 순종하라고 말해야 합니다
